alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 1:49PM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Saturday. The period of heaviest snow is expected tonight through Thursday morning and again Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will fall as low as roughly 5000 feet, meaning accumulating snowfall will occur lower than 7000 feet. Most impactful accumulations and hazards will occur above 7000 feet. Snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 5 AM Saturday: Jacob Lake 3 to 5 inches
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
